summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Yes To Face Wipes for Women and Men, Sensitive Facial Cleansing Wipes for use as a Make Up Remover, Cleaning, Soothing, Cucumbers Aloe Vera (Pack of 2)
Review Date: 2018/03/08
Store: Yes To
Product Description: ["Yes To Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes gently remove dirt, sweat and makeup (eye makeup too!) without the need to rinse. Whether you're out and about, going for a run, or having a late night, these wipes make it a snap to refresh on-the-go. Packed with green superfoods these all-natural, biodegradable wipes naturally refresh and rejuvenate all-in-one. Stay gorgeous, and go from zero to clean in seconds! Snap up the lid and snatch out a towelette! Gently glide across your face and neck. Feel refreshed? You should- your skin is clean, revitalized and nourished- in just a snap! These 95% natural, oil-free, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic wipes are made with compostable, FSC certified fabric. They are petroleum free, SLS free, paraben free, and cruelty-free. Say Yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes! These 2 pack wipes are specifically sold by the manfucaturer. We can&rsquo. INGREDIENTS Water, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativas (Cucumber) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt), Carpylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance."]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yes To', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Compostable Warning', 'Unit Count': '60 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '4.6 x 3.75 x 5.5 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1024734', 'UPC': '815921024734', 'Manufacturer': 'Yes To Inc.', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.  Learn More'}
Review Text: Love these wipes.  They have a very subtle cucumber scent that's pleasant but certainly not overpowering, and fine for men or women.  They wipe clean without leaving any film or residue and make skin feel refreshed.  They're hypoallergenic and the wipes are compostable.  Great scent, effective, and green.  Thumbs up!
Review Title: Great Subtle Scent, Effective, and Green - Love Them!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BeautyBio GloPRO Regeneration Tools
Review Date: 2019/01/21
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '9.88 x 2.38 x 7.88 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZumYu', 'Batteries': '2 AAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '810813030237 851262002673', 'Manufacturer': 'BeautyBio', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: I was excited to be able to try this out!  I am 48 years old and have some acne scarring around my chin.  I was hoping this would make an immediate difference.  I was pleasantly surprised that the pain was minimal as anything with "needle" makes me nervous.  I noticed some redness on the skin where I used the roller but the pain was not really noticeable.  I did not notice a real difference and am not sure that the red light is strong enough to make any true difference.  The roller and handle were both a good size and easy to maneuver on different areas of my face.  I will continue to use it to see if the longer I use it, the more of a difference it makes for my skin.
Review Title: Not sure if it is a $200 product
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LDR by Baysyx - Restorative Glow Hydro Boost Moisturizer | Nourishing Hydration Cream with Collagen Stimulation | Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid | Made in The USA from Natural Ingredients (1.7 Oz)
Review Date: 2019/09/10
Store: LDR
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LDR', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.2 x 1.1 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '725835779579', 'Manufacturer': 'LDR'}
Review Text: I am 49 years old with the usual skin concerns. I love the light texture of this moisturizer.  It is light but feels like it soaks in really well. I absolutely love the lemon scent.  It has a saltiness to it that makes it a very unique but nice scent.  The light weight texture combined with the scent make this a great product.  My only complaint is that once the lid is turned to open, it can be hard to press down on the top to get some of the lotion out.  The bottle is slippery once I have lotion on my hands and so sometimes it is hard to keep open so a minor design flaw but the product is great and I really think it works well on my more mature skin.
Review Title: Love this texture
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Review Date: 2020/01/01
Store: Natural Solution
Product Description: ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Review Text: I used this to exfoliate and loved the how my skin felt after I used this product.  I liked the light scent and it seemed to cleanse and exfoliate my skin gently.  I liked that this jar allows for multiple uses as a little bit of this goes a long way making it a great value for the money!
Review Title: Great for exfoliation
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FASHION IDOL Dreadlock Wig Synthetic Short Kinky Curly Wig Ombre Color Afro Twist Wig For African American 4C Wig Kanekalon Flame Retardant (OMBRE GREEN, DYTD1B/DG1)
Review Date: 2020/03/07
Store: FASHION IDOL
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly, Coily', 'Brand': 'FASHION IDOL', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 7.9 x 1.5 inches; 10.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '727780540150'}
Review Text: I got this for use as part of a costume and like it okay.  The hair looks pretty realistic, though the coloration isn't super even and isn't quite as real looking.  The quality is pretty good for the price, with a firm fit and hold.  In fact, it might be too firm for some as the cap part is on the small side.  If you have a large head or much hair under the wig, it's going to run a bit tight.  Overall pretty happy with it though.
Review Title: Pretty Good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast
Review Date: 2020/03/26
Store: Tame the Beast
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'}
Review Text: I like this body wash pretty well.  Be forewarned - it's really strong.  The scent has a strong minty and almost medicinal fragrance thanks to the menthol, though it's balanced with other fragrances that give it a pleasing masculine scent.  It also has the cool feel on the skin that you would expect with the menthol.  I like it for a nice invigorating wake up shower, but don't like it on cold mornings where the cooling adds to the feeling cold when I get out of the shower.  Good stuff on the right day!
Review Title: Really Strong But Pleasant
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history indicates a strong preference for skincare and grooming products, particularly those that are gentle, hypoallergenic, and infused with natural ingredients. The consistent high ratings reflect a tendency towards products that effectively cleanse and refresh the skin without leaving residue, favoring subtle scents that appeal to both genders. 

Common themes include a focus on multifunctionality and ease of use, as shown by the preference for on-the-go cleansing products like facial wipes that combine convenience with effectiveness. There is a notable interest in anti-aging solutions, though with cautious skepticism regarding efficacy, as seen in the mixed reviews for tools claiming significant skin regeneration.

Quality preferences lean towards products that exhibit natural formulation and green attributes, highlighting an inclination towards sustainability. Price sensitivity is observed; while willing to invest in quality, the consumer expresses ambivalence towards higher-priced tools lacking immediate results, favoring those that offer good value.

Overall, this individual demonstrates a clear inclination towards holistic, effective skincare solutions, with particular attention to texture, scent, and environmental impact, suggesting a mindful and informed shopping approach in self-care.

target_interaction.title: they worked!!
target_interaction.text: This product worked very well and helped my feet to look better almost immediately! They are pretty simple to use and have easy to follow instructions.  The smell was pleasant as well...not too chemically! They absolutely did what they said they would do!!
target_interaction.title_meta: Kastu Foot Peel Mask 2 Pack,Effective For Cracked Heels Repair,Remove Dead Skin,Callus and Dry Toe Skin,Soft Feet,Exfoliating Peeling Natural Treatment,Goat Milk Extract Moisturizes Feet Skin
